desc: Smart Funnel is excellent for use in the garage, kitchen, or anywhere! It's the easiest, cleanest, fastest way to pour liquids & powders. BPA-free + food-safe. Unique locking and measuring features keep your surfaces mess-free and eliminate product waste! Never spill again with our unique locking mechanism.

layout.text: When You Buy 2 or More Smart Funnels. Discount Applied at Checkout!
